titleStmt.title: The Book of oaths and the several forms thereof, both ancient and modern faithfully collected out of sundry authentick books of records not heretofore extant, very useful for all persons whatsoever, especially those that undertake any office of magistracy or publique imployment : whereunto is added a perfect table.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Twyford, T. Basset, B. Griffin, C. Harper [and 5 others] ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
